preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 6 g of beryllium powder. 
 2. Measure 1 g of cobalt powder. 
 3. Measure 4 g of molybdenum powder. 
 4. Measure 1 g of nickel powder. 
 5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 6. Use a spatula to mix thoroughly until a uniform blend is achieved.
